class CocoData[source]

CocoData()

Creates dataset for object detection models by downloading images from coco dataset. Specify the name of the dataset and which categories it contains. If data_path is None it creates a new folder in fastai's data path, like untar_data(). By default only bounding boxes, optionally with masks and crowded objects.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

CocoData.create[source]

CocoData.create(ds_name, cat_list, data_path=None, with_mask=False, max_images=1000, remove_crowded=True)

Creates a new coco dataset with categories defined in cat_list

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

CocoData.ls[source]

CocoData.ls(data_path=None)

List all available datasets.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

CocoData.remove[source]

CocoData.remove(ds_name, data_path=None)

Remove a downloaded coco dataset.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

CocoData.show_examples[source]

CocoData.show_examples(ds_name, data_path=None, n=3)

Show examples of a downloaded coco dataset.

path, df = CocoData.create("coco-cats-dogs", cat_list=["cat", "dog"], max_images=500, with_mask=True)
